code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{useWeb3React}from'@web3-react/core';import NoWalletConnected from'../components/WalletNotConnected';import{ProfileCreationContext}from'./contexts/ProfileCreationProvider';import Mint from'./Mint';import ProfilePicture from'./ProfilePicture';import TeamSelection from'./TeamSelection';import UserName from'./UserName';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Steps=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const{isInitialized,currentStep}=useContext(ProfileCreationContext);const{account}=useWeb3React();if(!account){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NoWalletConnected,{});}if(!isInitialized){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:t('Loading...')});}if(currentStep===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Mint,{});}if(currentStep===1){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfilePicture,{});}if(currentStep===2){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamSelection,{});}if(currentStep===3){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserName,{});}return null;};export default Steps;
